biocontainers.name: dialign
biocontainers.summary: Multiple alignment program which assembles a global sequence alignment from gap-free local pairwise alignments. this method could be especially useful when comparing large sequences that have only local similarities.

biotools.summary: Multiple alignment program which assembles a global sequence alignment from gap-free local pairwise alignments. This method could be especially useful when comparing large sequences that have only local similarities.

bioschemas.name: DIALIGN
bioschemas.summary: Multiple alignment program which assembles a global sequence alignment from gap-free local pairwise alignments. This method could be especially useful when comparing large sequences that have only local similarities.
